name: Sample MIDI Dump Exchange File
summary: Learn about .SDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SDX was a high-end drum system with sampling capabilities and extensive MIDI support. It included an internal hard disk drive and floppy disk drive, allowing users to store and share SDX files (the system also applied compression to the files to reduce their size).

instructions: You can open SDX files with FMJ-Software Awave Studio in Windows. To open an SDX file with Awave Studio, select File â†’ Open.
